description: Regardless of our propositions, both sides agreed that the split of the island is the best solution possible. The new border between the two territories will be internationally supervised until the resettlement of Forebergians and Karlenese is completed. Then those territories will be incorporated into the Karlenese Federation and the Republic of Foreberg respectively. Success of the mediation elevated our position as the regional power and increased our popular support onboard.

options.description: I knew it was worth a try!

title: The Ear Mediation successful
